verses.name: 2 Timothy 4:16
verses.text: At my first answer no man stood with me, but all men forsook me: I pray God that it may not be laid to their charge.

verses.name: 2 Timothy 4:17
verses.text: Notwithstanding the Lord stood with me, and strengthened me; that by me the preaching might be fully known, and that all the Gentiles might hear: and I was delivered out of the mouth of the lion.

verses.name: 2 Timothy 4:18
verses.text: And the Lord shall deliver me from every evil work, and will preserve me unto his heavenly kingdom: to whom be glory for ever and ever. Amen.

verses.name: 2 Timothy 4:19
verses.text: Salute Prisca and Aquila, and the household of Onesiphorus.
